Are you passionate about data analytics, visualization, and programming with R? If so, mark your calendar for the upcoming Maine R User Group Meetup in gorgeous Bar Harbor! Meet other data enthusiasts for an evening of knowledge sharing, collaboration, and community building!

Date: Thursday, Oct 5

Time: 4:00 - 6:00 pm

Location: Blaze, 198 Main Street, Bar Harbor

Event Highlights:

Network with R users from IDEXX, MaineHealth, the Roux Institute, The Jackson Laboratory and beyond.
Exchange ideas, tips, and best practices for leveraging R in data analysis, statistics, and more.
Expand your network and forge meaningful connections within the Maine R community.
Whether you're a seasoned R expert or just getting started, this event promises valuable insights, inspiring conversations, and a chance to connect with fellow R enthusiasts in the beautiful state of Maine. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to enhance your R skills, broaden your network, and be a part of the vibrant Maine R User Group community.
